MITC_HDFC_Home_Loan.pdf (HDFC Bank).source_text: Processing fee shall be upto 1.50% of the loan amount or Rs. 4500 whichever is minimum. This fee is non-refundable and payable at the time of loan application.

MITC_ICICI_Home_Loan.pdf (ICICI Bank).source_text: Processing charges range from 0.50% to 3.00% of the loan amount as applicable based on the loan scheme and customer profile.

SBI_Home_Loan_Terms.pdf (SBI Bank).source_text: Processing fee: 1% of loan amount plus applicable GST. Minimum Rs. 2000 and maximum Rs. 10000.

Axis_Bank_Home_Loan_MITC.pdf (Axis Bank).source_text: Processing fee ranges from 1.00% to 2.00% of the sanctioned loan amount depending on the loan scheme.

MITC_HDFC_Home_Loan.pdf (HDFC Bank).source_text: Interest rate will be linked to Retail Prime Lending Rate (RPLR) as declared by the bank from time to time.

MITC_ICICI_Home_Loan.pdf (ICICI Bank).source_text: The applicable interest rate shall be based on RPLR (Retail Prime Lending Rate) of ICICI Bank.

SBI_Home_Loan_Terms.pdf (SBI Bank).source_text: Interest rates are linked to SBI's Retail Prime Lending Rate (RPLR) and subject to periodic review.

Axis_Bank_Home_Loan_MITC.pdf (Axis Bank).source_text: Interest rates are linked to Axis Bank Lending Rate (ABLR) which is reviewed periodically by the bank.

MITC_ICICI_Home_Loan.pdf (ICICI Bank).source_text: Interest rate reset frequency: Monthly basis as per RBI guidelines and bank's internal policy.

Axis_Bank_Home_Loan_MITC.pdf (Axis Bank).source_text: Interest rate reset: Quarterly basis or as per RBI guidelines and bank policy changes.

MITC_HDFC_Home_Loan.pdf (HDFC Bank).source_text: Any changes in interest rates will be communicated through the bank's official website www.hdfc.com and displayed at branch notice boards.

MITC_ICICI_Home_Loan.pdf (ICICI Bank).value: Branch notification as per borrower address
MITC_ICICI_Home_Loan.pdf (ICICI Bank).source_text: Rate changes will be notified at the nearest loan servicing branch of ICICI Bank Limited/ICICI HFC as per the borrower's communication address.

SBI_Home_Loan_Terms.pdf (SBI Bank).source_text: Changes in REPO rate are notified and published in a newspaper or in the website of the Bank/RBI.

Axis_Bank_Home_Loan_MITC.pdf (Axis Bank).source_text: Rate changes will be communicated via SMS, email to registered customers and displayed at all branches.

MITC_HDFC_Home_Loan.pdf (HDFC Bank).source_text: Lock-in period: 6 months for non-individual borrowers. No prepayment charges for individual borrowers.

MITC_ICICI_Home_Loan.pdf (ICICI Bank).source_text: Prepayment is not allowed during the first 12 EMI period. After this period, prepayment is allowed with applicable charges.

Axis_Bank_Home_Loan_MITC.pdf (Axis Bank).source_text: Lock-in period of 12 months from the date of first disbursement. Prepayment allowed thereafter with charges.

MITC_HDFC_Home_Loan.pdf (HDFC Bank).source_text: Foreclosure charges: NIL for individual borrowers. For non-individual borrowers: 2% of outstanding principal amount.

SBI_Home_Loan_Terms.pdf (SBI Bank).source_text: No foreclosure charges for floating rate home loans. Fixed rate loans may attract penalty as per terms.

Axis_Bank_Home_Loan_MITC.pdf (Axis Bank).source_text: Foreclosure charges: 1% of outstanding principal amount applicable after completion of lock-in period.

MITC_HDFC_Home_Loan.pdf (HDFC Bank).source_text: Minimum income eligibility: Salaried - Rs. 25,000 per month, Self-employed - Rs. 2,00,000 per annum.

MITC_ICICI_Home_Loan.pdf (ICICI Bank).source_text: Income criteria: Minimum Rs. 20,000 per month for salaried individuals, Rs. 1,50,000 per annum for self-employed.

SBI_Home_Loan_Terms.pdf (SBI Bank).source_text: Minimum income: Rs. 15,000 per month for salaried, Rs. 1,00,000 per annum for self-employed professionals.

Axis_Bank_Home_Loan_MITC.pdf (Axis Bank).source_text: Minimum income eligibility: Rs. 30,000 per month for salaried employees, Rs. 3,00,000 per annum for self-employed.

SBI_Home_Loan_Terms.pdf (SBI Bank).value: Salary slips, Form 16, ITR for last 2 years
SBI_Home_Loan_Terms.pdf (SBI Bank).source_text: Income documents: Latest 3 months salary slips, Form 16, Income Tax Returns for last 2 years.

MITC_HDFC_Home_Loan.pdf (HDFC Bank).source_text: LTV ratio: Up to 90% for loan amounts up to Rs. 30 lakhs, 80% for amounts above Rs. 30 lakhs.

MITC_ICICI_Home_Loan.pdf (ICICI Bank).source_text: Loan to Value ratio: Up to 85% of property value, 90% for women borrowers under special schemes.

SBI_Home_Loan_Terms.pdf (SBI Bank).source_text: Maximum LTV: 80% of property value, enhanced to 85% for women borrowers and senior citizens.

Axis_Bank_Home_Loan_MITC.pdf (Axis Bank).source_text: LTV ratio: Maximum 80% for loans up to Rs. 75 lakhs, 75% for higher amounts.
